item.title: How the Best Leaders Rise Above Ego and Lead With Love Instead
item.description: When you operate from fear or greed, you get smaller. When you lead with love, your impact expands.

item.description: This cosmic phenomenon will put on one heck of a show this weekend, and the moon will cooperate too—so don’t miss it.

item.title: 4 Innovative Gift Ideas From the Latest Episode of Shark Tank
item.description: From savory ‘gingerbread’ houses, to fancy stockings, these innovative Shark Tank participants are reimagining holiday gifts.
